title: (x) What the font?? / 'Chick ’n Scratch': irregular serif - Romance Fatal Serif {Tamas}
content:
Hi Guys,

I came across this logo and was wondering what the font could possibly be.

Thanks,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120916090139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logocns_6563.JPG)
author: ostorey

comments.content: Looks like squished and heavily-munged Times to me.
That may be, but it's a font on its own: [Romance Fatal Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120916090139/http:/www.dafont.com/romance-fatal-serif.font?nb_ppp=50&text=Chic+%27n+Scratch)
Latin of the String by Book Artificer leave variety you loss in couple with the violin. It has all the famous instrumental euphony re-arranged for string.
Yes, that's the font that's always more popular than Neuton on dafont.com.
